p: The elder individuals are comparatively more affected by COVID-19 infection; however, individuals of any age can acquire the infection ( 51). According to the previous reports, 87% of infected individuals were between 30 and 79 years old. Moreover, the mortality rate was higher in older people. The case fatality rate of 8% was observed among individuals having age between 70 and 79 years, while 15% fatality rate was reported in people with 80 years or older ( 47).
